description:
The uShip application, specially designed for your Palm Pre and Pixi gives you direct access to all of your important uShip activity with notifications. Shipping customers and Service Providers can now stay up to date with bidding, booking, asking and answering questions, status updates and much more. The uShip application is the best way to manage your uShip account when you are on the go.

Don't have a uShip account? Create one now at www.uShip.com
